venue_description: Wellington International (formerly Palm Beach International Equestrian Center) is one of the most recognizable equestrian sporting venues in the United States. Spanning more than 500 acres, it features 18 competition arenas with state‑of‑the‑art sand footing, a main International Arena with stadium and box seating, more than 250 permanent stalls, horse trails, golf‑cart tracks and shopping areas. The facility is home to the Winter Equestrian Festivalhttps://www.palmbeachsports.com/facilities/wellington-international/#:~:text=3400%20Equestrian%20Club%20Dr,FL%2033414.

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Wellington International (venue_uid=wef-venue)","Location":"city: Wellington city_uid=wellington, state:FL state_uid=fl.","GEO context":"lat=26.6335313, lon=-80.27086079999999 placeid=EjYzNDAwIEVxdWVzdHJpYW4gQ2x1YiBEciAjMmMsIFdlbGxpbmd0b24sIEZMIDMzNDE0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCSk5HPVMJdmIEXhSPKLypcGsEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://wellingtoninternational.com/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

data-dine-am:
{
  "venue_uid": "wef-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "name": "Gabriel’s Café & Grille",
      "approx_drive": "6 min / 1.8 mi",
      "distance_m": 2600,
      "cuisine": "Cafe, American, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "07:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["omelets", "pancakes", "bagels", "breakfast burritos", "coffee"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "popular with horse show crowd; mornings get busy",
      "source_link": "https://www.facebook.com/gabrielscafegrille/menu"
    },

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Florida-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Wellington International in Wellington, FL is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: Wellington International (formerly Palm Beach International Equestrian Center) is one of the most recognizable equestrian sporting venues in the United States. Spanning more than 500 acres, it features 18 competition arenas with stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art sand footing, a main International Arena with stadium and box seating, more than 250 permanent stalls, horse trails, golfâ€‘cart tracks and shopping areas. The facility is home to the Winter Equestrian Festivalhttps://www.palmbeachsports.com/facilities/wellington-international/#:~:text=3400%20Equestrian%20Club%20Dr,FL%2033414.
